song_lyrics: Pramukh Swāmī tame yād āvyā... Osartī. Dhruv
Ābhalu bharīne tārī pāngarī chhe prīt,
Hu to poyaṇ thaī karuṇāmā rāchu,
Pramukh Swāmī tame yād āvyā... Osartī. 1
Āp to agādh, māro āratno sād,
Have mūngī vāṇī ne maun vahete
Pramukh Swāmī tame yād āvyā... Osartī. 2
title: Osartī sandhyānā joyā me rang

metadata.kirtan_info:
2-1255: Sadhu Yogendradas

Category: Pramukh Swami Maharajna Pad
